alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Gibson; Henderson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 1:58AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Henderson, southeastern Gibson, southwestern Carroll and northeastern Madison Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 158 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Trenton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Humboldt, Milan, Trenton, Fairview, Three Way, Carroll, Medina, Gibson, Hickory Flat, Gibson Wells, Cedar Grove, New Enterprise, Gilmore, Sitka, Brazil, Vaughns Grove, Georgetown, Laneview and Claybrook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
